Text: questions Cc Were going to press on the forced ranking story I have a couple more questions for you If you can have answers to me by in the morning June Id appreciate it thanks Michelle What does the room look like in one of these peer review committee sessions Are the PRCs around a conference table if so what kind cherry wood mahogany etc Whats on the wall in these rooms Are there charts etc Are the rankings on paper or on the wall Does everyone have a copy of the rankingsand employees paper work ie the feedback responses etc How many employees does one PRC rep represent generally Tell me about some of the perks that Enron offers its employees ie childcare daycare daycamp etc On the day that I was there what was that barbeque outing all about Was that something that was company sponsored If so how often do you sponsor it Tell me about some of the awards the company has received ie best workplace etc These answers dont have to be long Just give me the basics thanks much Michelle Michelle McCalope freelance writer phone fax
